name: i heart you... (Demo)
description:
Romance | GxB | Slice of Life

i heart you... is a slice of life dating sim that will leave you asking for more; featuring 2 love interests and what looks to be a light-hearted rival. 

i heart you... is currently in development so it will help a lot if you comment what parts you enjoyed, parts you didn't or if you encountered any other bugs.

This game wouldn't have come out without my lovely supporters. I know sometimes it can be hard to donate to your favourite developer but that support continues to raise me up from the dark place that I am in sometimes. 

Thank you soooooo much for considering to play this demo! I love you guys so much :D

|Disclaimer |

For some reason, the image at the start of the game doesn't load so just press the two buttons that appear. You can know when this happens when you hear the music start playing. I'm sorry for this error and I will fix it in the full release. 

Himari has recently finished high school, and memories from those mixed times has caused her to reconsider her true feelings. But it isn't all bad, or at least that's what she thought... Experience a coming of age, immersive demo that will leave you hooked for what will come next. A cast full of personalities, and two opposites of love interests. Maybe just maybe one will make your heart beat faster than anything before... Nekka for sprites.
